summary: This mod expands Breezehome slightly. It adds a few new features and aesthetics, and generally makes the place a little nicer
descriptionHtml:
=== Description ===========================================================

This mod expands Breezehome slightly. It adds a few new features and aesthetics, and generally makes the place a little nicer.

Changes:

Added whiterun banners
Added a whole room in the unused space upstairs
Moved the bed to the new room
Added several lights to light up the new surroundings
Moved Lydia\'s chair into her own room. She will now no longer keep sitting in your room eating bread
Added Arcane Enchanter beside the Alchemy Table
Moved the downstairs chairs and table off to the side
Moved a book case
Re-arranged the entire upstairs area. Now has display cases
Closed holes in the walls in the master bedroom and display room

IMPORTANT: REMOVE YOUR STUFF FROM THE UPSTAIRS WEAPON DISPLAY BEFORE INSTALLING, IT HAS BEEN DELETED, AND WILL GLITCH IF YOU DON\'T REMOVE YOUR ITEMS

=== Installation ===========================================================

Manual:
Download and extract to data folder. Activate the .esp with either the default launcher or some other program that has the capability.

NMM:
Download and activate with NMM.

=== Updates =============================================================

v0.5.6 - Moved chest, added new chest, lowered display cases slightly.
v0.5.5 - upload
author: Vohcaz

files.name: Breezehome Small Improvements - Optional Noble Bed
